name: @aws/aws-wasm-checksums
description: WASM implementations of checksums used by the AWS SDKs
author: landonxjames

scripts.build-js-bindings: cargo component build --release && npx jco transpile ./target/wasm32-wasip1/release/aws_wasm_checksums.wasm -o ./js-bindings/ --no-namespaced-exports
scripts.build: npm run build-js-bindings && npx tsc && npm run copy-js-bindings && npm run copy-package-json
